Readbetter Chrome Extension: Seamlessly Convert and Send Web Content to Your Kindle

Transform any web content into Kindle's native format with the Readbetter Chrome extension, and send it to your Kindle in just seconds. Enjoy distraction-free reading with less eye strain, bringing your favorite web articles directly to your Kindle device.

Readbetter excels in converting interactive rich media content, ensuring embedded tweets, high-quality images, and charts are preserved for an optimal reading experience on your Kindle.

A Readbetter.io account is required to use this extension. Free plans are available.
